strings.ITEM_ROYAL_GUARD_PICKUP: This party is getting crazy, let's rock!
strings.ITEM_ROYAL_GUARD_DESCRIPTION:
Replace your <style=cIsUtility>Utility Skill</style> with <style=cIsUtility>Block</style>.
Enter a defensive stance for <style=cIsUtility>{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{1} per stack)</style> seconds, deflecting first non-periodic hit. <style=cIsUtility>Depending for how long you were in the stance</style> gain <style=cIsDamage>3 to 1</style> damage buff(s). If you have <style=cIsDamage>damage buffs</style> when using <style=cIsUtility>Block</style>, your <style=cIsUtility>Primary Skill</style> gets replaced with <style=cIsUtility>Release</style>.
Using <style=cIsUtility>Release</style> will <style=cIsDamage>consume all damage buffs</style> and deal <style=cIsDamage>{2}</style> <style=cStack>(+{2} per stack)</style> base damage per buff stack to everyone in <style=cIsDamage>{3}m</style> radius. <style=cIsUtility>Release</style> has increased proc coefficient. You can have up to <style=cIsDamage>{4} stacks of damage buff</style>.
strings.ITEM_ROYAL_GUARD_LORE:
Mitrix: It was my assumption that those chimeras would prove far inferior... In the face of your tactics.
Commando: You construct and kill... Construct and kill... I fail to see the logic here. Is sanity the price to pay for power!?
Mitrix: Lemurians... They are but stubborn and foolish. It takes a journey to Petrichor V for them to accept and praise Providence. A fact that tickles irony's judgment.
Commando: And your judgments interests me not. For I'm here... To reclaim... What is rightfully mine.
Mitrix: Ukulele! That is what you seek. And that is why I wait in your path!
Commando: You will fumble in your opposition of my quest. Though I encourage! For an opportunity to battle a being of such grand delusions as you, is a sweet fortune!
strings.SKILL_ROYAL_GUARD_PARRY_DESC: Enter a defensive stance for <style=cIsUtility>{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{1} per stack)</style> seconds, deflecting first non-periodic hit. <style=cIsUtility>Depending for how long you were in the stance</style> gain <style=cIsDamage>3 to 1</style> damage buff(s). If you have <style=cIsDamage>damage buffs</style> when using <style=cIsUtility>Block</style>, your <style=cIsUtility>Primary Skill</style> gets replaced with <style=cIsUtility>Release</style>. You can have up to <style=cIsDamage>{2} stacks of damage buff</style>.
strings.SKILL_ROYAL_GUARD_RELEASE_DESC:
<style=cIsDamage>Consume all damage buffs</style> and deal <style=cIsDamage>{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{0} per stack)</style> base damage per buff stack to everyone in <style=cIsDamage>{1}m</style> radius. Has increased proc coefficient.

Wow you are fast.
strings.BUFF_ROYALGUARD_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Determines how much damage you will deal on using Release skill.

RU.ITEM_ROYAL_GUARD_DESCRIPTION:
Заменяет <style=cIsUtility>вспомогательный навык</style> на <style=cIsUtility>Блок</style>.
Вводит в защитную стойку на <style=cIsUtility>{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{1} за штуку)</style> секунд, отражая первый непериодический урон. <style=cIsUtility>В зависимости от того насколько быстро был отражен урон</style> накладывает <style=cIsDamage>от 3 до 1</style> эффекта(ов). Если эти <style=cIsDamage>эффекты</style> есть на игроке когда был использован <style=cIsUtility>Блок</style>, <style=cIsUtility>основной навык</style> будет заменен на <style=cIsUtility>Взрыв</style>.
<style=cIsUtility>Взрыв</style> снимет <style=cIsDamage>все эффекты</style> от Блока и нанесет <style=cIsDamage>{2}</style> <style=cStack>(+{2} за штуку)</style> базового урона за единицу эффекта всем врагам в <style=cIsDamage>{3} метровом</style> радиусе. <style=cIsUtility>Взрыв</style> имеет увеличенный коэффициент проков. Одновременно может быть наложено до <style=cIsDamage>{4} единиц эффекта</style>.
RU.ITEM_ROYAL_GUARD_LORE:
Я не буду переводить это потому что слишком канонично.
Mitrix: It was my assumption that those chimeras would prove far inferior... In the face of your tactics.
Commando: You construct and kill... Construct and kill... I fail to see the logic here. Is sanity the price to pay for power!?
Mitrix: Lemurians... They are but stubborn and foolish. It takes a journey to Petrichor V for them to accept and praise Providence. A fact that tickles irony's judgment.
Commando: And your judgments interests me not. For I'm here... To reclaim... What is rightfully mine.
Mitrix: Ukulele! That is what you seek. And that is why I wait in your path!
Commando: You will fumble in your opposition of my quest. Though I encourage! For an opportunity to battle a being of such grand delusions as you, is a sweet fortune!
RU.SKILL_ROYAL_GUARD_PARRY_DESC: Вводит в защитную стойку на <style=cIsUtility>{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{1} за штуку)</style> секунд, отражая первый непериодический урон. <style=cIsUtility>В зависимости от того насколько быстро был отражен урон</style> накладывает <style=cIsDamage>от 3 до 1</style> эффекта(ов). Если эти <style=cIsDamage>эффекты</style> есть на игроке когда был использован <style=cIsUtility>Блок</style>, <style=cIsUtility>основной навык</style> будет заменен на <style=cIsUtility>Взрыв</style>. Одновременно может быть наложено до <style=cIsDamage>{2} единиц эффекта</style>.
RU.SKILL_ROYAL_GUARD_RELEASE_DESC:
Снимет <style=cIsDamage>все эффекты</style> от Блока и нанесет <style=cIsDamage>{0}</style> <style=cStack>(+{0} за штуку)</style> базового урона за единицу эффекта всем врагам в <style=cIsDamage>{1} метровом</style> радиусе. Имеет увеличенный коэффициент проков.

А ты шустрый.
RU.BUFF_ROYALGUARD_DAMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Определяет сколько урона будет нанесено Взрывом.
